abstract: Federal officials have urged banking giant Bank of America to revamp its board and bring in directors with more banking experience, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Federal officials have urged banking giant Bank of America to revamp its board and bring in directors with more banking experience, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials have urged banking giant Bank of America to revamp its board and bring in directors with more banking experience, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: U.S. Presses BofA on Board Revamp, Report Says
